SUBJECT: Sodeeq - your recent article

Hi Sodeeq,

I read your post "Why Scandium Stands Out Among Test Automation Tools" - great insights.

I'm David Ariyo, a Full Stack Developer. I recently built Dassage Communication Platform - Real-time messaging with video calls, file sharing, WebSocket architecture

Tech: React, Node.js, MongoDB, WebSocket | Scale: 100+ concurrent users

Would you be open to a brief chat if Scandium Systems Inc ever needs freelance development support?

Best regards,
David Ariyo
Full Stack Developer
davidariyo109@gmail.com | (+234) 903-6184-863
